text: Chaumes-en-Retz is a commune of 6,759 people (2017). It is found in the region Pays de la Loire in the Loire-Atlantique department in western France. The municipality was created on 1 January 2016 from the former communes of Arthon- en-Retz (the seat) and Chéméré.Arrêté préfectoral 14 December 2015 == References == Category:2016 establishments in France Category:Communes in Loire-Atlantique
title: Chaumes-en-Retz
